intro.p: The GStreamer team is pleased to announce the second release of the unstable 1.9 release series, which marks the feature freeze for 1.10. The 1.9 release series is adding new features on top of the 1.0, 1.2, 1.4, 1.6 and 1.8 series and is part of the API and ABI-stable 1.x release series of the GStreamer multimedia framework. The unstable 1.9 release series will lead to the stable 1.10 release series in the next weeks. Any newly added API can still change until that point.
Binaries for Android, iOS, Mac OS X and Windows will be provided in the next days.

This module, gstreamer, only contains core functionality. For actual media playback, you will need other modules.
gst-plugins-base contains a basic set of well-supported plugins gst-plugins-good contains a set of well-supported plugins under our preferred license gst-plugins-ugly contains a set of well-supported plugins, but might pose problems for distributors gst-plugins-bad contains a set of less supported plugins that haven't passed the rigorous quality testing we expect, or are still missing documentation and/or unit tests gst-libav contains a set of codecs plugins based on libav (formerly gst-ffmpeg)

bug.summary: message: Add extra information fields to error/warning/info messages
leaks tracer: list alive objects on demand and add 'checkpointing' support
leaks tracer: display creation stack trace of leaked objects
buffer: add explicit setters and getters for GstBufferFlags
element: clean up thread pool from gst_task_cleanup_all()
leaks: warn if object is destroyed while the tracer is disposing
message: fix annotation of message parse API returning objects
core: add a couple of transfer annotations
collectpads: add g-i transfer annotations to peek/pop/read_buffer/take_buffer functions
leaks: update type filter later for unknown types
element: Add API to more easily post messages about flowing issues
streams: notify tag update only when tags actually changed
multiqueue: High CPU usage with multiple audio tracks in playbin3
docs: fix typo on stream selection
